channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Your Home, Made Perfect
channel.desc: Two architects use virtual reality to pitch ideas for an extraordinary garden room.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener And Friends
channel.desc: Join Tanya Visser and her gardening friends as they showcase stunning gardens by top designers, offer easy DIY projects, and keep viewers updated on the latest gardening tools.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey
channel.desc: Get maximum flavour from vegetables in the fridge with a killer recipe for green beans and tips on taking a roast cauliflower to the next level.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: Real Health is a lifestyle show featuring holistic health solutions in an easy to absorb and palatable manner.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Carlo's Reno Rescue
channel.desc: Carlos, Jarrod and Jewel are renovating a room for community supporter Anne Riley to give her a place to rest and recharge.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Find Me A Beach House
channel.desc: Vin and Suzie have recently retired and are looking for their dream home on the beautiful Gold Coast. Main considerations are enough bedrooms for their adult children and a media room as they love to sing and create music.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Chateau DIY
channel.desc: Chris and Jolyon are caught short whilst wallpapering their new suite. Jane and Rory's hunt for their dream home starts to crumble.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: Nicki Chapman is in Devon on a house hunting mission with a professional singer.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Love It Or List It
channel.desc: Phil Spencer and Kirstie Allsopp help clothing designer Lexie and IT consultant Ed from Nottingham decide whether to renovate their four-bed one-bathroom house or sell it and move elsewhere.

channel.title: Real Health

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Design For You
channel.desc: Jane Foxcroft from Carne Interiors transforms a small space into a modern sanctuary. Designer Claudia Panzeri talks Modular furniture. At Studio Lloyd, we explore handcrafted lighting pieces.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The House JK Built
channel.desc: Christmas and the original move-in deadline has been gone and architect Chris Tate visits JK's house for the first time since his concept went from paper to reality.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Janet and Kristopher moved into this house three years ago with the expectation that it would only be a starter home. Drew and Jonathan give it a top-of-the-range update.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Australia's Best House
channel.desc: We are looking to the forefront of current design trends. We meet up with Gary who walks us through a Neoclassical display home with plenty of character.

channel.title: Design For You
channel.desc: Jane Foxcroft from Carne Interiors transforms a small space into a modern sanctuary. Designer Claudia Panzeri talks Modular furniture. At Studio Lloyd, we explore handcrafted lighting pieces.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Ten Minute Kitchen
channel.desc: The first recipe is Kelvin Cheung's Mapo Tofu. Combining his Asian and Canadian heritage, Kelvin creates this delicious Tofu recipe that is a perfect accompaniment with rice or noodles or just by itself.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Dream Gardens
channel.desc: Michael and Karen decided to move to a sprawling farmhouse in the country. With their toddler on his feet, they can create a family garden that includes a play area.
